Presentations

GitHub’s trainers have published several presentations on Git, including our monthly Intro to GitHub and Git, in addition to curating the best educational Git links from around the web.

    By Scott Chacon

GitHub Help

GitHub’s help website is an excellent resource to keep bookmarked. It covers a range of Git topics from basic setup, all the way through to advanced topics.
